meanings.sent2: Coffee energises people in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The energetic puppy energises the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Laughter energises the soul like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: Music has the power to energise our spirits.

meanings.definition: Cause to be active or lively
meanings.sent2: A good book can energise the mind.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party energised the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Positive feedback can energise a team to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The crowd's cheers energised the basketball players.
